message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $110 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit to $120. I think that's a very competitive price for this product.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $115 for the product.
